Package com.flipfit.business

Class UserBusiness

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.UserBusiness
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserBusinessInterface
public class UserBusiness extends Object implements UserBusinessInterface
Author:
Akshitha Business logic class for user-related operations. This class handles the business rules for user registration, authentication, and profile management, acting as an intermediary between the user interface and the data access layer (DAO).

  • Method Details

    • getUsers

      public List<User> getUsers()
      Retrieves the list of users currently held in memory.
      Returns:
      A List of User objects.

    • setUsers

      public void setUsers(List<User> users)
      Sets the static list of users.
      Parameters:
      users - A List of User objects to be set.

    • registerCustomer

      public boolean registerCustomer(Customer customer)
      Registers a new customer in the system. This method delegates the registration process to the DAO layer.
      Specified by:
      registerCustomer in interface UserBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object to be registered.
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successful, false otherwise.

    • authenticateUser

      public boolean authenticateUser(User userToAuth)
      Authenticates a user based on their credentials. This method checks the user's details against the stored records via the DAO.
      Specified by:
      authenticateUser in interface UserBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      userToAuth - The User object containing the credentials to authenticate.
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully authenticated, false otherwise.

    • editProfile

      public boolean editProfile(Customer customer)
      Edits the profile details of an existing customer. The updated customer information is passed to the DAO for persistence.
      Specified by:
      editProfile in interface UserBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object with updated details.
      Returns:
      true if the profile was successfully edited, false otherwise.

    • registerGymOwner

      public boolean registerGymOwner(GymOwner gymOwner)
      Registers a new gym owner in the system. This operation is delegated to the DAO layer.
      Specified by:
      registerGymOwner in interface UserBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      gymOwner - The GymOwner object to be registered.
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successful, false otherwise.
